(before she went out on leave) have been handling the trust-related issues.

> —Glad to hear that all is quiet. 
> —Who from the Civil Division will be assigned to deal with Epstein trust-related matters? 
> —You're kind to say so, but once you've given notice, it's better to leave sooner rather than later. Subject to 
what 
have to say, my tentative departure date is two weeks from today (July 20). I obviously would 
be happy to discuss things Civil (or to review proposed CIDs) at any point until then. 
> —My weekend was quiet. Pretty uneventful. Not unlike most other days except that I  pretty much stayed away 
from email. 
> 
Sent from my iPhone
